intro: Hymenocoleus neurodictyon var. neurodictyon, commonly known as the slender sea holly, is a marine plant belonging to the family Zosteraceae. It is characterized by its ribbon-like leaves that are often ribbon-like and can be found in shallow coastal waters. The plant forms dense underwater mats, contributing to the stability of marine sediments. It is typically found in the intertidal and subtidal zones of temperate regions. Its morphology is adapted to withstand wave action and tidal fluctuations.
